name: Acid
display_help: The Acid Pool continues to burn you and slow your movement.

name: Immobilize
display_help: Acid entity cannot move

name: Crush
display_help: You have been crushed. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Crush2
display_help: You have been crushed. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Devour
display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes, increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Devour2
display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Note that Devour is unaffected by Range changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Infection
display_help: Your Defense and Damage Resistance are reduced by 1/3 per stack of this power. Recharge: Moderate

name: Cripple_Tell
display_help: The Avatar's ectoplasmic fluid has the ability to drain the energy out of an individual. It can, however, be avoided, as it can only affect targets in a narrow cone in front of it. Note that Preparing to Cripple is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

name: Cripple
display_help: The Avatar's ectoplasmic fluid has the ability to drain the energy out of an individual. The affected target is drained of all Endurance and receives a debuff to Recharge Rate and Recovery for 15s. Though this can be devastating, Cripple can be avoided, as it can only affect targets in a narrow cone in front of it. Recharge: Slow

name: Grant_Corruption
display_help: The Avatar has gained Corruption!

name: Corruption
display_help: The Avatar is uniquely attuned to Desdemona's magic through his defeat of Vanessa. He will continuously do damage to her as long as the battle rages. This damage in increased by the number of allies she is currently protecting with her Ember Shroud, as this weakens her personal defenses.

name: Grasp_of_Gaea
display_help: You are being consumed by the Will of the Earth. The Avatar of Hamidon will draw life essence from your location in six seconds. Stand apart from allies to help survive the blast! Recharge: Slow

name: Damage_Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Summon_Seedlings
display_help: Construct one to three Battle Drones (depending on your level) to do your bidding. Drones start out with only basic weaponry, but can be upgraded with heavier energy weapons. Drones can Super Leap. You may only have 3 Drones under your control at any given time. If you attempt to construct more Drones, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have three, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

name: Temp_Invulnerability
display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

name: Invincibility
display_help: While this power is active, the Hero receives a huge bonus to Defense against melee attacks and some bonus To Hit for each additional foe in melee range. Most effective while fighting multiple opponents. This power is ineffective if you are battling foes at a range.

name: SummonFX
display_help: This power is simply the visual fx for when the Hero is released.

name: Frost
display_help: This power emanates a very short cone of Frost from the Hero's hands chilling all those in its arc. This attacks slowly chills the target over time, slowly dealing damage and slowing his attack speed.

name: Frozen_Fists
display_help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice giving them the ability to quickly inflict minor damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Ice_Bolt
display_help: You have been slowed by the freezing Ice Bolt. Your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: You have been slowed by the freezing Ice Blast. Your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

name: Freeze_Ray
display_help: The Freeze Ray has rendered you unconscious. Any damage will awaken you.

name: Ice_Storm
display_help: The Ice Storm is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

name: Blizzard
display_help: The Blizzard is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your Accuracy, attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

name: Snow_Storm
display_help: The freezing Snow Storm is reducing your movement speed and attack speed.

name: SummonFX
display_help: This power is simply the visual fx for when the Hero is released.

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Gale
display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

name: Havoc_Punch
display_help: You are electrocuted. You could be freed if you are assisted.

name: Thunder_Strike
display_help: You are Disoriented.

name: Thunder_Clap
display_help: The Thunder Clap has stunned you.

name: Freezing_Rain
display_help: Summons Freezing Rain at a targeted location. Freezing Rain deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long

name: Hurricane
display_help: The driving winds of the Hurricane are blinding you. Your Range and Accuracy are reduced.

name: Lightning_Storm
display_help: The Hero can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Hero. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

name: SummonFX
display_help: This power is simply the visual fx for when the Hero is released.

name: Stone_Mallet
display_help: The Hero Summons a Stone Mallet from the very earth. Stone Mallet, deals moderate damage and can knock down foes.

name: Rock_Armor
display_help: While this power is active, the Hero's skin becomes Stone. Rock Armor make the Hero highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect the Hero.

name: Quicksand

name: Earths_Embrace
